name: portfolio-build-system
description: Build system for Jekyll + Next.js portfolio

scripts.build:jekyll: cd jekyll-content && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.dev:jekyll: cd jekyll-content && bundle exec jekyll serve --watch
scripts.sync: cp jekyll-content/_site/*.json nextjs-portfolio/public/ && cp -r jekyll-content/_site/assets nextjs-portfolio/public/

author: Irineos Kyritsis
